trends: There have been no other sightings in Parachute
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details Please note I will be putting some sample pictures in the mail today along with my nerative report of the event, that is dated April 28 2008. Just to for worn you, I havent seen any type of documentation as of yet to come close to compair of what I hold in my mind, as well as the photos and video I have to back it all up. I have been pulling my hair out trying to find a site like this, as I have spoke with a number of news people to hopfully share this rare event with, but of course it is to hard to comprehend, to those who refuse to understand, I have shown family and freinds, all with the same end result, they all were picking up their chins off the floor, just after the first couple pictures I showed. So to all who belive, be ready for some shocking material in the near future. I of course will be expecting to hear from someone from this organization to hopefully get some sort of answers or confirmation of this sighting. PS sorry I didn't post any on your site, I am funny that way when it comes to these darn internet sites, I know how some think these days, it will be copied if they know it pays.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
Object Shape: Cigar, Circle, Fireball, Saturn-like, Sphere, Star-like, Unknown
Summary: A dancing light with lots of video and photo back up!!
